headline: Disappointed with the whole experience
pros: It is a small shop, you get to be heads down coding. You have time to research and apply new technologies as long as you do it on your own time.
cons: They treat you like an hourly employee having to clock in and out via an application on your computer. There is no remote access or telecomuting opporunities.
